snippet: SHAPIRO--Daniel. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Daniel Shapiro. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Daniel. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Daniel Shapiro. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Philip R. Cowen President The Harmonie Club 1/3
